1.name: The Princess Bride
1.description: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

2.name: Dirty Dancing
2.description: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

3.name: Full Metal Jacket
3.description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

4.name: The Lost Boys
4.description: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.

5.name: The Running Man
5.description: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

6.name: Hellraiser
6.description: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover; the demonic cenobites are pursuing him after he escaped their sadomasochistic underworld.

7.name: Predator
7.description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

8.name: The Monster Squad
8.description: A young group of monster fanatics attempt to save their hometown from Count Dracula and his monsters.

9.name: RoboCop
9.description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

10.name: Spaceballs
10.description: A rogue star pilot and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a Princess and save the galaxy from a ruthless race of beings known as Spaceballs.

11.name: Evil Dead II
11.description: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

12.name: Empire of the Sun
12.description: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation during World War II.

13.name: The Untouchables
13.description: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

14.name: Angel Heart
14.description: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

15.name: Fatal Attraction
15.description: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

16.name: Creepshow 2
16.description: Three more bone-chilling tales that include a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and a hitchhiker who wants revenge and will not die.

17.name: Lethal Weapon
17.description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

18.name: The Gate
18.description: Kids, left home alone, accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

19.name: Masters of the Universe
19.description: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

20.name: Some Kind of Wonderful
20.description: When Keith goes out with Amanda, the girl of his dreams, Amanda's ex-boyfriend plans to get back at Keith. Meanwhile, Keith's best friend, tomboy Watts, realizes she has feelings for Keith.

21.name: Mannequin
21.description: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

22.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
22.description: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

23.name: Overboard
23.description: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her they're husband and wife.

24.name: Adventures in Babysitting
24.description: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

25.name: Summer School
25.description: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.

26.name: The Witches of Eastwick
26.description: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

27.name: Wall Street
27.description: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

28.name: The Living Daylights
28.description: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

29.name: La Bamba
29.description: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper.

30.name: Can't Buy Me Love
30.description: A nerdy outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to be his girlfriend.

31.name: Raising Arizona
31.description: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

32.name: Beverly Hills Cop II
32.description: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

33.name: Over the Top
33.description: Tough trucker Lincoln Hawk is determined to win back his son and triumph at the world arm wrestling championships.

34.name: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
34.description: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with an obnoxious slob of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

35.name: Near Dark
35.description: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

36.name: Prince of Darkness
36.description: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

37.name: Three O'Clock High
37.description: A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.

38.name: Moonstruck
38.description: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

39.name: The Last Emperor
39.description: The story of the final Emperor of China.

40.name: House II: The Second Story
40.description: The new owner of a sinister house gets involved with reanimated corpses and demons searching for an ancient Aztec skull with magic powers.

41.name: Harry and the Hendersons
41.description: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

42.name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
42.description: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

43.name: Innerspace
43.description: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

44.name: 3 Men and a Baby
44.description: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

45.name: Bad Taste
45.description: The population of a small town disappears and is replaced by aliens that chase human flesh for their intergalactic fast-food chain.

46.name: Der Himmel über Berlin
46.description: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

47.name: The Barbarians
47.description: Two twin barbarians seek revenge from the warlord who massacred their tribe and captured them when they were small children.

48.name: Less Than Zero
48.description: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

49.name: Slumber Party Massacre II
49.description: Courtney Bates, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to their condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.

50.name: Hamburger Hill
50.description: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.
